item.title: How can i make a poison affect stronger?
item.dc:creator: @kicker862 kicker862
item.description:
@kicker862 wrote:

I made a code so only I can wield a weapon and if someone else wields it it removes it and poisons them.
Can I make that poison effect do more damage?
Here’s the code.

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1205 && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Hsbreaker")) { remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], 3); sendMessage("You can't wield such power"); PoisonPlayer(); }

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make a poison affect stronger?
